product_name: Alchemy Goods Elliott Mini Toiletry Kit - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Save suitcase space and the environment with the Elliot Mini toiletries bag, made with the same reclaimed truck tire inner tubes as the original, in a smaller more packable size for lighter travelers.
